amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce HUD's Transformation Initiative (technical assistance and capacity building) by $40 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to reduce HUD's Transformation Initiative (technical assistance and capacity building) by $40 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 217 (Roll no. 488).
